name: solar-calculator
description: Equations for computing the position of the Sun.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n solar -o dist/solar-calculator.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run pretest && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" dist/solar-calculator.js -c -m -o dist/solar-calculator.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j dist/solar-calculator.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/solar-calculator.js dist/solar-calculator.min.js
